channel.title: Henry Thomas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Henry Thomas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cameron Cowperthwaite, Henry Thomas and Willa Holland Check into Garrett Martin’s ‘The Asylum’
item.description: The psychological thriller, written and directed by Martin, follows the events inside a sinister facility where a dedicated counselor is helping those with mental health issues.
